name: relogef
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0), wcel(c0, crn(clog)))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ ℝ, (log `(exp ` c0))= c0, c0 ∈ ran(log))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))

⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ →(log `(exp ` c0))= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℝ → c0 ∈ ran(log))
⊣ (c0 ∈ ran(log)→(log `(exp ` c0))= c0)
